page.title: 04WHAT I DID AT THE WEEKEND
page.content: Extracts from children's writing"What I did at the weekend"15/16 June 1985 Richard:Helped my dad fix the goat's pen. Sally:Went to town for some bedding for my gerbil. Nicola:Bought my dad some rum truffles in a fancy box. Andy:Went to the Amusements and played the machines.Then watched television. Darren:Went caddying for my dad,then drove over the Moors to tea gardens. Gillian:Watched Logan's Run on video. Najma:Went to the market to buy presents for Eid. At 9.41pm adults who were fasting could eat.We ate curry, chappatis, melon, oranges and apples. Helen:On Sunday we went to give my grandad his father's day card.My grandma has arthritis and her feet are swollen. Andrea:Went to church,sang and prayed.
